name: RCN 3721
description:
Author Notes:

This was my first game jam.  Worked on the game for roughly a week. I had zero multiplayer experience. But it was easier than I thought it would be.

Objective:

Group up with your team members to eliminate the opposing team.  You cannot hurt your teammates (Just TRY to do it).

Controls:
  • W - Up Arrow: Move Forward
  • A - Up Arrow: Move Left
  • S - Up Arrow: Move Backward
  • D - Up Arrow: Move Right
  • X - Left Ctrl - Middle Mouse Button: Jump / Jetpack
  • Space: Thrust
  • Left Click - Control: Shoot
  • Right Click - Left Alt: Aim
  • Left Shift-Right Shift: Sprint
  • E-Home: Toggle Side (Only when Aiming)
